verses.text: \w How|strong="H4100"\w* beautiful \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* sandaled feet, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* prince! \w The|strong="H7725"\w* curves \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* thighs \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* jewels, \w the|strong="H7725"\w* handiwork \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* master.

\w Your|strong="H3027"\w* navel \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rounded goblet; \w it|strong="H3644"\w* never lacks blended wine. \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* waist \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mound \w of|strong="H1323"\w* wheat encircled \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* lilies.
Your breasts are \w like|strong="H7799"\w* two fawns, twins \w of|strong="H6194"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* gazelle.

Your neck is \w like|strong="H7699"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tower made \w of|strong="H8147"\w* ivory; your eyes \w are|strong="H7699"\w* \w like|strong="H7699"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* pools \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Heshbon \w by|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* gate \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Bath-rabbim; your nose is \w like|strong="H7699"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* tower \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Lebanon, facing toward Damascus.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w crowns|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* Mount Carmel, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* hair \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* purple threads; \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* captured \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* tresses.
How fair \w and|strong="H4428"\w* pleasant \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* love, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* delights!
\w Your|strong="H4100"\w* stature \w is|strong="H4100"\w* like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* palm tree; \w your|strong="H4100"\w* breasts \w are|strong="H4100"\w* clusters \w of|strong="H8588"\w* fruit.

\w I|strong="H1819"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H1819"\w* will climb \w the|strong="H1819"\w* \w palm|strong="H8558"\w* \w tree|strong="H8558"\w*; \w I|strong="H1819"\w* will take hold \w of|strong="H6967"\w* its fruit.” May your \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* be \w like|strong="H1819"\w* clusters \w of|strong="H6967"\w* \w the|strong="H1819"\w* vine, \w the|strong="H1819"\w* fragrance \w of|strong="H6967"\w* your breath \w like|strong="H1819"\w* apples,

\w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* mouth \f + \fr 7:9 \ft Hebrew palate \f* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* finest wine. \w The|strong="H5927"\w* Bride \w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* flow smoothly \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* beloved, gliding gently \w over|strong="H5927"\w* lips \w and|strong="H5927"\w* teeth.\f + \fr 7:9 \ft LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate; Hebrew gliding gently over lips as we sleep\f*

\w I|strong="H1980"\w* belong \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1980"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* desire \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H2896"\w* \w me|strong="H1980"\w*.

Come, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* go \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* countryside; let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* spend \w the|strong="H5921"\w* night \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wildflowers.\f + \fr 7:11 \ft Or among the henna blossoms or in the villages\f*

\w Let|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H7704"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* early \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* vineyards \w to|strong="H3318"\w* see if \w the|strong="H3318"\w* vine \w has|strong="H3318"\w* budded, if \w the|strong="H3318"\w* blossom \w has|strong="H3318"\w* opened, if \w the|strong="H3318"\w* pomegranates are \w in|strong="H3212"\w* bloom— \w there|strong="H3885"\w* \w I|strong="H3212"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w give|strong="H7704"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* mandrakes \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fragrance, \w and|strong="H7925"\w* \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* door \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w every|strong="H5414"\w* delicacy, new \w as|strong="H5414"\w* well \w as|strong="H5414"\w* old, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* treasured \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*.
